version.title: Module update detected
version.content:
Thank you for updating!

Settings configurations have been changed since your last update and will need to be restored to default settings.

Please read v3.1.4 changes.txt to find out more.

NumberOfActors.Name: Number of Actors
NumberOfActors.Hint: Enter how many actors do you want rolled. Use with CAUTION if Dice So Nice! is enabled.

DiceSoNiceEnabled.Name: Dice So Nice!
DiceSoNiceEnabled.Hint: If checked, and Dice So Nice! is installed and enabled, 3D dice will be rolled across your screen only.

NameFormat.Name: Name Format
NameFormat.Hint: Character Name format if no name is provided.

HideResultsZone.Name: Hide Results Zone
HideResultsZone.Hint: This setting will hide Results Zone when "Apply as Rolled" is selected.

ReverseRingMethodScrolling.Name: Reverse Ring Method Scrolling
ReverseRingMethodScrolling.Hint: Reverse the default mouse wheel scroll direction during Ring Method selection.

ShowOtherPropertyResults.Name: Show Other Property Results
ShowOtherPropertyResults.Hint: Select how you want Other Property Results displayed with Result Description. Other Properties Results are other rolls executed by Enhanced Support for things like class, equipment, weapons, armor, etc.

IncludeResultDescription.Name: Include Result Description
IncludeResultDescription.Hint: This setting will include result description from Other Property Results on character sheet; such as in Biography, Backstory or Notes.

RollMethodAndDistribution.Name: Roll Method & Distribution
RollMethodAndDistribution.Hint: Select how many dice to roll, how many sets to roll, how to distribute results and other roll method and distribution rules.

AbilitiesRollMethod.Name: Number of d6 Rolled
AbilitiesRollMethod.Hint: Select how many d6 are to be rolled

DropLowestDieRoll.Name: Drop Lowest Die Roll
DropLowestDieRoll.Hint: Drop the lowest die roll from the number of d6 rolled.

ReRollOnes.Name: Reroll Ones
ReRollOnes.Hint: Reroll 1's until a 1 is not rolled.

NumberOfSetsRolled.Name: Number of Sets Rolled
NumberOfSetsRolled.Hint: Select how many sets of die are to be rolled

DropLowestSet.Name: Drop Lowest Set
DropLowestSet.Hint: Drop the lowest set from the number of sets rolled.

BonusPoints.Name: Bonus Points
BonusPoints.Hint: Select how many bonus points are to be awarded

Over18Allowed.Name: Scores Over 18 Allowed
Over18Allowed.Hint: Checking this setting will allow scores over 18 when distributing rolled scores and/or bonuses. Setting is ignored when Distribution Method selected is "Apply as Rolled" - and no Bonus Points are awarded.

MinimumAbilityTotal.Name: Minimum Ability Total
MinimumAbilityTotal.Hint: Minimum final total ability score, including bonus points. 0 = No Min

MaximumAbilityTotal.Name: Maximum Ability Total
MaximumAbilityTotal.Hint: Maximum final total ability score, including bonus points. 0 = No Max

DistributeResults.Name: Distribute Results
DistributeResults.Hint: This setting will allow distribution of results freely among abilities.

DistributionMethod.Name: Distribution Method
DistributionMethod.Hint: Choose how results will be distributed among abilities.

ChatRemoveConfigureActorButton.Name: Remove Configure Actor Button
ChatRemoveConfigureActorButton.Hint: This setting will remove the Configure Actor button when clicked.

ChatSettings.Name: Chat Settings
ChatSettings.Hint: Select which information to hide or show in chat log.

ChatShowMethodText.Name: Roll Method & Distribution Rules
ChatShowMethodText.Hint: Show the Roll Method & Distribution rules for new abilities.

ChatShowCondensedResults.Name: Condensed Ability Results
ChatShowCondensedResults.Hint: Display ability results in condensed form if Ability Results is checked.

ChatShowDieResultSet.Name: Die Result Set
ChatShowDieResultSet.Hint: Show all die rolls, excluding rerolled and discarded rolls, as a set in chat message. e.g. d6 = [1, 2, 3,...].

ChatShowDifficultyText.Name: Difficulty
ChatShowDifficultyText.Hint: Show Difficulty text - this is just a fun way of showing the probability of rolling high numbers.

ChatShowNoteFromDM.Name: Note From DM
ChatShowNoteFromDM.Hint: A simple - automated - note from DM which explains the distribution and score limit rules to players.

results.label: Results
results.min_max_failed: (Adjust number of die/sets rolled or Min/Max values)

note-from-dm.label: Note from DM
note-from-dm.apply-as-rolled: Each result will be applied to abilities in the order they were rolled.
note-from-dm.distribute-freely: You may distribute these scores among your abilities as you desire.
note-from-dm.ring-method: You may select three consecutive die rolls and apply them to any ability.
note-from-dm.distribute-bonus-points: The Bonus Point(s) may be distributed among any of your scores.

form-text.ring-method: Ring Method: This method allows you to select three consecutive die rolls and apply them to any ability.
